name: Space Funeral: The Legend of Earth Birth
name_original: Space Funeral: The Legend of Earth Birth
description:
Space Funeral: The Legend of Earth Birth, also known as Earth Birth or Space Funeral 3, is a fanmade sequel to Space Funeral developed by DuckStapler. The game was publicly released on February 18, 2013 and is considered one of the longest games in the series to date.

The creator of the original Space Funeral, thecatamites, spoke directly to DuckStapler and was so blown away by Earth Birth that they dubbed the game as canon.
